content: I'll ask some questions during the Q&A session about my art process, like how I come up with ideas and what inspires me, as well as some tips and tricks I've learned along the way. By the way, speaking of my art, my most popular video on TikTok, a time-lapse of me drawing a portrait, got 1,200 views! Do you think I should share some behind-the-scenes content from that video during the Q&A session?
